Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters applied upon hitting various materials.

aiVolumeRate.Wiki: Normal when 1x. When set to 0, the sound radius becomes 0 (SE and SFX are unrelated game-like parameters).

spEffectIdOnHit0.Wiki: When this hit material is hit, this SpEffect is applied to the character.

spEffectIdOnHit1.Wiki: When this hit material is hit, this SpEffect is applied to the character.

footEffectHeightType.Wiki: The height at which to generate the foot effect when hitting this material.

footEffectDirType.Wiki: The direction in which to generate the foot effect when hitting this material.

floorHeightType.Wiki: Determines the floor height for this hit material. For floating items such as the surface of the water

disableFallDamage.Wiki: If ON, hitting this material will not cause fall damage.

isHardnessForSoundReverb.AltName: Is Hard Material for Sound Reverb
isHardnessForSoundReverb.Wiki: If ON, impacting this material is treated as a hard material for sund reverb.

hardnessType.Wiki: The hardness of the material upon impact. Used for soft contact processing of rigid bodies.

wetTiming.Wiki: Controls whether the whole body gets wet when stepping on the floor material, or whether it gets wet if specified by TAE.

spEffectId_forWet.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material makes the target wet.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_2.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 2.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_3.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 3.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_4.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 4.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_5.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 5.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_6.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 6.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_7.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 7.

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_8.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 8.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_2.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 2.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_3.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 3.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_4.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 4.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_5.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 5.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_6.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 6.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_7.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 7.

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_8.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when this material is hit during Journey 8.

vehicleSpeedEffectRate.Wiki: The influence rate this material applies to vehicles. Vehicle Set Speed ​​* Influence Rate = Vehicle Speed

replaceMateiralId_Rain.Wiki: The hit material ID to use during rain. -1 means no change is made.
